item.title: Creating a player object
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I’m writing a somewhat title system for my client, but I’m coming across some troubles when I’m trying to display them in the chat area.

I know where the problem lies, I just don’t know how to create the Player object in order to display the titles being sent from the server for each individual player and because there is no Player parameter, I’m confused.

I tried looping through the players and assigning it like that

for (int i = 0; i < playerCount; i++) { Player player = playerArray[i]; }
but that just gives me multiple lines of text which I don’t want.

This is what I need I believe

j2 += textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(chatNames[k]) + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(player.getPlayerTitle()) + ":".length(); drawBasicString(Colours.getColourByName("dark orange") + [b]player.[/b]getPlayerTitle() + " " + Colours.getColourByName("red") + this.optimizeText(chatNames[k]) + ":", j2, yPos, 0x7e3200, -1);

Can someone give me some guidance?
